meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by septicemia.
meanings.sent1: The septicemic patient was given antibiotics to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the septicemic condition based on the symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The septicemic teddy bear needed a bandage for its pretend injury.
meanings.sent4: The septicemic cloud of pollution spread rapidly across the city.
meanings.sent5: The septicemic wound oozed with pus, indicating a serious infection.

meanings.sent1: The septicemic bacteria quickly spread throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: The septicemic outbreak was traced back to contaminated water.
meanings.sent3: The septicemic prank caused quite a stir among the students.
meanings.sent4: The septicemic fear of the virus gripped the entire community.
meanings.sent5: The septicemic disaster left a trail of destruction in its wake.
